publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>This Technical Design Report presents a detailed description of all aspects of the LUXE (Laser Und XFEL Experiment), an experiment that will combine the high-quality and high-energy electron beam of the European XFEL with a high-intensity laser, to explore the uncharted terrain of strong-field quantum electrodynamics characterised by both high energy and high intensity, reaching the Schwinger field and beyond. The further implications for the search of physics beyond the Standard Model are also discussed.</jats:p>
title: Technical Design Report for the LUXE experiment
